works.complaint:
This article contains specific attacks on my person.
It  
is a a violation of my personal life, work and email privacy. The man who 

posted this article has included in it certain e-mails that belonged to me
 
and my ex-girlfriend. The owner of this blog has a complaint, issued be my
 
lawyers and I, in accordance with the Romanian Penal Code,  
art.195 "Violation of mail privacy" I request the urgent removal of this  

URL in accordance to my right to privacy and in accordance to the Romanian
 
Penal Code, witch specifies that no person has the right to publish
another  
persons emails. I would also like to add that the owner of this blog is  
under investigation by the Romanian Police, who is trying to track down
the  
source of these emails.
